I'm Ivonne, a student, immigrant, devoted reader, enthusiastic about tech and volunteer in Glasgow, Scotland. It's my very first coding experience, so I decided to build this basic webpage about reading and my other interests.

Reading builds up the ability to focus and grasp complex ideas, also strengthens the ability to imagine alternative paths. It does not matter what you read, fictional, non-fictional, mythological, political and so on. Neither if you read a printed book or an Ebook. Books are as mighty as technology!

Have you ever read any of the these books?

My favourite book is The Name of the Rose by Umberto Eco.

Do you have any? tell me...
